content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The apartment is, after all, in the city center. How does the price of 2500 Euro sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While the location is attractive, I must focus on finding the lowest possible price. Considering that detail, I would say 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because needing an affordable option due to student budget.' TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
